ValidationRule.description: Requires that the case rec type match the office rec type
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Office__c )) , (( CONTAINS (RecordType.DeveloperName, 'BOFE Investigation')|| CONTAINS (RecordType.DeveloperName, 'BOFE Inspection Request')|| CONTAINS (RecordType.DeveloperName, 'BOFE Intake Cases')|| CONTAINS (RecordType.DeveloperName, 'BOFE Intake'))
&& Office__r.RecordType.DeveloperName <> 'BOFE' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'WCA' && Office__r.RecordType.DeveloperName <> 'WCA' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Garment' && Office__r.RecordType.DeveloperName <> 'Garment' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The office you selected is not valid for this type of case.
